sections.title: Introduction (Wide Shot)
sections.content: Hey, I’m Jihad Al Sayed. In this tutorial, we’re going back to the basics — matrix operations. If you want to manipulate data, build models, or do anything meaningful in linear algebra, you need these tools.

sections.title: Why Operations Matter
sections.content: These operations are the foundation for everything from linear transformations to neural network computations. Get these wrong and the whole system falls apart.

sections.title: Recap
sections.content: We covered addition, subtraction, scalar multiplication, matrix multiplication, and transpose. These operations are your first toolkit for working with matrices and manipulating data.
